Text: Thank you for these "mini" versions of Real Time. This show doesn't really need HD or ultra-detail for those of us who don't have it. Simply being able to hear the show, with a few minimal pictures, is plenty. Good job, and keep at it!
Please...please...included one http tracker...next time. Thanks...

10 HTTP trackers, 6 UDP trackers.

I'm using a somewhat obsolete client (uTorrent 1.6.1) which can't actually use the UDP ones. But once there are other seeds, you can use them with each other.

What makes you think I have no HTTP trackers?

AVIGUY
